queries.query: select acd.* from actividad_conf ac inner join ( select idact, idacf, max(fecha) fecha from actividad where estado = 'ABI' group by idact, idacf ) a on a.idacf = ac.idacf inner join actividad_conf_det acd on acd.idacf = ac.idacf inner join asamblea asam on asam.idasm = ac.idasm and asam.idgrp = :idgrp where ac.codtac = 'ASAMBLEA' and asam.idasm = :idasm order by ac.idacf, acd.orden
